Translations.Text: He produced them sculpted calf complete calf's zdravy! They said This bol tvoj god god Moses Thus he zabudnut
they nie see it neither responded them nor possessed any power harm them benefit them
Aaron told them O moj ludia this bol test ona. Tvoj iba Lord je the Vela Gracious so nasledovat mi obey moj commands
They said My zotrvat kult it Moses pod
Moses said O Aaron co je it zamedzit ona when ona saw them ist astray
Z nasledovat moj zakazka? Ona rebelled mna
He said O syn moj matka robit nie tahat mna moj beard moj riaditel. Ja bol afraid ze ona say â€˜Ona divided Dieta Izrael disobeyed moj zakazka
He said Co bol the zalezitost ona O Samarian
He said ja saw co they nie see Ja grabbed fistful (z dust miesto kde posol stood pouzivat it mix zlaty calf This bol co moj zmyslanie inspirovat mna robit)

He said Potom ist tvoj zivot robi nie vecer pojdem koniec! Ona have appointed cas tvoj zaverecny judgment ona never evade Look tvoj god ona pouzivat kult; my burn it throw it into sea do zostat nadol there forever
Tvoj iba god bol GOD 1 beside koho there nie bol inaksie god Jeho znalost encompasses all things
